header.title: Manage Your Reputation in One Place
header.description: Send review requests to your customers, handle negative feedback with care, create quick survey campaigns to collect opinions, and share your best reviews on social media — all from one easy-to-use dashboard.

importListings.title: Import Existing Listings
importListings.description: Easily import and review all your current listings with one click. Stay organized and ensure your business information is always up to date.

addListing.title: Add Listing
addListing.subtitle: Didn't find your business in the listings?
addListing.description: — Add a new one in seconds and start tracking reviews, ratings, and reputation performance instantly.

addBusiness.title: Add Business
addBusiness.description: Search for your business and add it to start managing reviews, ratings, and reputation.
addBusiness.successDescription: Your business has been added successfully.
addBusiness.errorDescription: Failed to add business. Please try again.
addBusiness.noteDescription: Business added but could not auto-select. Please select manually.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.listingError: An error occurred while importing listings
